## isDefined() function

Test whether an argument is non-undefined

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isDefined<T>(arg: T | undefined): arg is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arg | T \| undefined | argument to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

arg is T
